conbody.p:
The parameters for configuring a SOAP server are listed in the following table. SOAP server parameters
Parameter
Description
Server Name
Unique identifier for the SOAP request. This is used as the primary key. It can have a maximum of 50 characters.
Host IP
IP address/hostname of the SOAP server.
Port
The port number used for the SOAP server. The value range is 1-65535.
URI Path
URI for SOAP server. The URI should be valid path with / characters as appropriate, for example, /source1/source2.
SOAP Action
The SOAP action to be sent to the back office.
Valid values: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE
Authentication
If this flag is set to true, then the username and password are checked for authentication before sending the SOAP request.
Default value: false
User Name
The user name required for authentication. It can have a maximum 50 characters.
Note: This is mandatory if the authentication is set to true.
Password
The password required for authentication. It can have a maximum 100 characters.
Note: This is mandatory if the authentication is set to true.
Description
The description of the SOAP request.
